exceptions.tactic: apply filter_imp with (fun y => f y = g y).
exceptions.exn: In environment K : AbsRing U, V : NormedModule K F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F f, g : U -> V H1 : F (fun y : U => f y = g y) H2 : forall x : U, is_filter_lim F x -> f x = g x H3 : ex_filterdiff f F Unable to unify "?F" with "filterdiff g F" (unable to find a well-typed instantiation for "?F": cannot ensure that "(U -> V) -> Prop" is a subtype of "(U -> Prop) -> Prop").

In environment K : AbsRing U, V : NormedModule K F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F f, g : U -> V H1 : F (fun y : U => f y = g y) H2 : forall x : U, is_filter_lim F x -> f x = g x H3 : ex_filterdiff f F H : forall P Q : ?T -> Prop, (forall x : ?T, P x -> Q x) -> ?F P -> ?F Q Unable to unify "f ?M3658 = g ?M3658" with "is_linear f".
The reference H4 was not found in the current environment.

original: intros H1 H2 H3. intros H4 xf H5. destruct H5 as [L H5]. exists L. intros P HP. apply filter_imp with (fun y => f y = g y). intros x Hlim. apply H2; auto. apply H4; auto.
